Compatible with iOS 10 to 13. (Including arm64e/A12 Devices).

BatteryFolderTitle is a Neat Tweak that Allows to Show the Battery Level instead of the Folders Titles when they Being opened!

The Tweak Gives also the Opportunity to Select other Features for the Folders Titles to Combine Together like Selecting Custom Titles Sizes and More!

BatteryFolderTitle is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository with the Adding of the Preferences Bundles and also with More Options to Configure.

If you Have got My Repo Version, Just Uninstall it and Install this New One.

Configure options from Settings.

No Respring Needed for Enabling and Disabling the Tweak and its Every options.

See Screenshots below.
